title: Funeral services held for Lancaster teen accidentally shot and killed by friend
content:
LANCASTER COUNTY, Pa. —
Funeral services are tonight in Lancaster County for a teen boy who police say was accidentally shot and killed by his friend.
Ibram Hanna, 15, would have been a sophomore at Hempfield High School when school starts next week. The district is providing counseling to students.
Police have charged a 17-year-old boy with involuntary manslaughter in Hanna's death.
Police say the 17-year-old stole the gun from a car and both boys were looking at it when it went off.
